item.title: More Efficient Smithing
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

sorry about that typo :l
and i did do this all myself. i have over 10 hours of work into this as to debugging,rearranging, and checking. and as for making it more clustered uum this is a big improvement from what was in it before.

examples:
initsmithing before:
[TOO LARGE]

after:

[code] public void initSmithing(int barType) {
int bar=0;
if (barType==2349)
bar=0;
if (barType==2351)
bar=1;
if (barType==2353)
bar=2;
if (barType==2359)
bar=3;
if (barType==2361)
bar=4;
if (barType==2363)
bar=5;
String types[]={“Dagger”,“Axe”,“Chain Body”,“Med Helm”,“Dart Tips”,“Sword”,“Mace”,“Plate Legs”,“Full Helm”,“Arrow Tips”,“Scimitar”,“Warhammer”,“Plateskirt”,“Sq Shield”,“Knives”,“Long Sword”,“Battle Axe”,“Platebody”,“Kite Shield”,“Wire”,“2h Sword”,“Claws”,“Lantern”,“Nails”,“Studs”};
//String types[]={"","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","",""};

    outStream.createFrame(97);
    outStream.writeWord(994);
for(int j=0;j<25;j++)
{
	if(Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][0]!=0)
	{
		if(amountOfItem(barType)<Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][3])
			sendQuest("@red@"+Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][3]+"bars",Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][4]);
		else
			sendQuest("@gre@"+Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][3]+"bars",Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][4]);

		if(playerLevel[13]<Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][2])
			sendQuest("@red@"+types[j],Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][5]);
		else
			sendQuest("@gre@"+types[j],Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][5]);

  	} else {
		sendQuest("",Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][4]);
		sendQuest("",Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][5]);
	}
}	
	int counter=0;
	for (int k=0;k<5;k++) {
		for (int l=0;l<5;l++){
			if(Item.smithing_frame[bar][k*5+l][0]!=0){
				addItemToSmith(Item.smithing_frame[bar][counter][0],k,1119+l,Item.smithing_frame[bar][counter][1]);
			}	counter++;
		}
			
	}

}
[/code]

cansmith before:

public boolean canSmith(int item) { if (item == 1205 || item == 1351 && playerLevel[13] >= 1) { return true; } if (item == 1422 && playerLevel[13] >= 2) { return true; } if (item == 1139 && playerLevel[13] >= 3) { return true; } if (item == 1277 || item == 819 && playerLevel[13] >= 4) { return true; } if (item == 1321 || item == 39 && playerLevel[13] >= 5) { return true; } if (item == 1291 && playerLevel[13] >= 6) { return true; } if (item == 1155 || item == 864 && playerLevel[13] >= 7) { return true; } if (item == 1173 && playerLevel[13] >= 8) { return true; } if (item == 1337 && playerLevel[13] >= 9) { return true; } if (item == 1375 && playerLevel[13] >= 10) { return true; } if (item == 1103 && playerLevel[13] >= 11) { return true; } if (item == 1189 && playerLevel[13] >= 12) { return true; } if (item == 3095 && playerLevel[13] >= 13) { return true; } if (item == 1307 && playerLevel[13] >= 14) { return true; } if (item == 1203 && playerLevel[13] >= 15) { return true; } if (item == 1087 || item == 1075 || item == 1349 && playerLevel[13] >= 16) { return true; } if (item == 1420 && playerLevel[13] >= 17) { return true; } if (item == 1117 || item == 1137 && playerLevel[13] >= 18) { return true; } if (item == 1279 || item == 820 || item == 4820 && playerLevel[13] >= 19) { return true; } if (item == 1323 || item == 40 && playerLevel[13] >= 20) { return true; } if (item == 1293 && playerLevel[13] >= 21) { return true; } if (item == 1153 || item == 863 && playerLevel[13] >= 22) { return true; } if (item == 1175 && playerLevel[13] >= 23) { return true; } if (item == 1335 && playerLevel[13] >= 24) { return true; } if (item == 1363 && playerLevel[13] >= 25) { return true; } if (item == 1101 || item == 4540 && playerLevel[13] >= 26) { return true; } if (item == 1191 && playerLevel[13] >= 27) { return true; } if (item == 3096 && playerLevel[13] >= 28) { return true; } if (item == 1309 && playerLevel[13] >= 29) { return true; } if (item == 1207 && playerLevel[13] >= 30) { return true; } if (item == 1067 || item == 1081 || item == 1353 && playerLevel[13] >= 31) { return true; } if (item == 1424 && playerLevel[13] >= 32) { return true; } if (item == 1115 || item == 1141 && playerLevel[13] >= 33) { return true; } if (item == 1281 || item == 1539 || item == 821 && playerLevel[13] >= 34) { return true; } if (item == 1119 && playerLevel[13] >= 48) { return true; } if (item == 4544 && playerLevel[13] >= 49) { return true; } if (item == 1209 && playerLevel[13] >= 50) { return true; } if (item == 1355 && playerLevel[13] >= 51) { return true; } if (item == 1428 && playerLevel[13] >= 52) { return true; } if (item == 1143 && playerLevel[13] >= 53) { return true; } if (item == 1285 || item == 822 || item == 4822 && playerLevel[13] >= 54) { return true; } if (item == 1329 || item == 42 && playerLevel[13] >= 55) { return true; } if (item == 1299 && playerLevel[13] >= 56) { return true; } if (item == 1159 || item == 866 && playerLevel[13] >= 57) { return true; } if (item == 1181 && playerLevel[13] >= 58) { return true; } if (item == 1343 && playerLevel[13] >= 59) { return true; } if (item == 1369 && playerLevel[13] >= 60) { return true; } if (item == 1109 && playerLevel[13] >= 61) { return true; } if (item == 1197 && playerLevel[13] >= 62) { return true; } if (item == 3099 && playerLevel[13] >= 63) { return true; } if (item == 1315 && playerLevel[13] >= 64) { return true; } if (item == 1071 || item == 1085 && playerLevel[13] >= 66) { return true; } if (item == 1121 && playerLevel[13] >= 68) { return true; } if (item == 1211 && playerLevel[13] >= 70) { return true; } if (item == 1430 && playerLevel[13] >= 72) { return true; } if (item == 1145 && playerLevel[13] >= 73) { return true; } if (item == 1287 || item == 823 || item == 4823 && playerLevel[13] >= 74) { return true; } if (item == 1331 || item == 43 && playerLevel[13] >= 75) { return true; } if (item == 1301 && playerLevel[13] >= 76) { return true; } if (item == 1161 || item == 867 && playerLevel[13] >= 77) { return true; } if (item == 1183 && playerLevel[13] >= 78) { return true; } if (item == 1371 && playerLevel[13] >= 79) { return true; } if (item == 1111 && playerLevel[13] >= 81) { return true; } if (item == 1199 && playerLevel[13] >= 82) { return true; } if (item == 3100 && playerLevel[13] >= 83) { return true; } if (item == 1317 && playerLevel[13] >= 84) { return true; } if (item == 1213 && playerLevel[13] >= 85) { return true; } if (item == 1073 || item == 1091 || item == 1359 && playerLevel[13] >= 86) { return true; } if (item == 1432 && playerLevel[13] >= 87) { return true; } if (item == 1123 || item == 1147 && playerLevel[13] >= 88) { return true; } if (item == 1289 || item == 824 || item == 4824 && playerLevel[13] >= 89) { return true; } if (item == 1333 || item == 44 && playerLevel[13] >= 90) { return true; } if (item == 1303 && playerLevel[13] >= 91) { return true; } if (item == 1163 || item == 868 && playerLevel[13] >= 92) { return true; } if (item == 1185 && playerLevel[13] >= 93) { return true; } if (item == 1347 && playerLevel[13] >= 94) { return true; } if (item == 1373 && playerLevel[13] >= 95) { return true; } if (item == 1113 && playerLevel[13] >= 96) { return true; } if (item == 1201 && playerLevel[13] >= 97) { return true; } if (item == 3101 && playerLevel[13] >= 98) { return true; } if (item == 1319 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) { return true; } if (item == 1079 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) { return true; } if (item == 1079 || item == 1093 || item == 1319 || item == 1127 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) { return true; } if (item == 15335 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) { return true; } if (item == 15334 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) { return true; } if (item == 15333 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) { return true; } if (item == 15336 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) { return true; } if (item == 15195 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) { return true; } else { return false; } // return false; }

after:

public boolean canSmith(int item) { for (int i=0;i<6;i++) { for (int j=0;j<25;j++) { if(Item.smithing_frame[i][j][0]==item) if (Item.smithing_frame[i][j][2]<=playerLevel[13]) return true; } } if (item == 15335 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) return true; if (item == 15334 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) return true; if (item == 15333 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) return true; if (item == 15336 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) return true; if (item == 15195 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) return true; return false; // return false; }

as as far as conventions go im sorry i am used to c++ :\ and i am not an expert at that either.

item.title: More Efficient Smithing
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Credits:
i did this all but i dont care about credits
Hai again (:
Base: czar(allstar)
difficulty: 1/10(Copy and paste)
This is basicly a rewritten version of what the server already has but it reads it all from item.java
space saved: about 14kb(this includes other skills i have shortened though also)

step 1:
open item.java and findpublic int smithing_frame[]
replace that array with this.

[code]public static int smithing_frame[][][] = {
{
{ 1205, 1, 1, 1, 1125, 1094},//dagger
{ 1351, 1, 1, 1, 1126, 1091},//axe

step 3:

[code] /* SMITHING*/
public int removeBar(int removeID) {
if(removeID == 1215
|| removeID == 15334
|| removeID == 15195
|| removeID == 15333
|| removeID == 15335
|| removeID == 15336) {
return 15331;
}
for (int j=0;j<25;j++)
{
if (Item.smithing_frame[0][j][0]==removeID)
return 2349;
if (Item.smithing_frame[1][j][0]==removeID)
return 2351;
if (Item.smithing_frame[2][j][0]==removeID)
return 2353;
if (Item.smithing_frame[3][j][0]==removeID)
return 2359;
if (Item.smithing_frame[4][j][0]==removeID)
return 2361;
if (Item.smithing_frame[5][j][0]==removeID)
return 2363;

}
    return 0;
}

public int barsNeeded(int slot, int column) {

	return Item.smithing_frame[0][slot*5+(column-1119)][3];
}

public int barsNeeded2(int slot, int column) {
	return Item.smithing_frame[0][slot*5+(column-1119)][3]*5;
}

public int barsNeeded3(int slot, int column) {
	return Item.smithing_frame[0][slot*5+(column-1119)][3]*10;
}

public int smithXP(int barType, int barAmount) {
    if (barType == 2349) {
        return barAmount * 1500;
    }
    if (barType == 2351) {
        return barAmount * 2700;
    }
    if (barType == 2353) {
        return barAmount * 3000;
    }
    if (barType == 2359) {
        return barAmount * 4500;
    }
    if (barType == 2361) {
        return barAmount * 5500;
    }
    if (barType == 2363) {
        return barAmount * 7000;
    }
    if (barType == 15331) {
        return barAmount * 1200;
}
    setAnimation(898);
    return 0;

}

	public boolean canSmith(int item) {
	for (int i=0;i<6;i++)
	{
		for (int j=0;j<23;j++)
		{
			if(Item.smithing_frame[i][j][0]==item)
				if (Item.smithing_frame[i][j][2]<=playerLevel[13])
					return true;
		}
	}
   		if (item == 15335 && playerLevel[13] >= 99)
       		return true;
    	if (item == 15334 && playerLevel[13] >= 99)
        		return true;
    	if (item == 15333 && playerLevel[13] >= 99)
        	return true;
    	if (item == 15336 && playerLevel[13] >= 99)
        	return true;
    	if (item == 15195 && playerLevel[13] >= 99)
        	return true;
        return false;
    // return false;
}
public void addItemToSmith(int id, int slot, int column, int amount) {
    outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(34); // init item to smith screen
    outStream.writeWord(column); // Column Across Smith Screen
    outStream.writeByte(4); // Total Rows?
    outStream.writeDWord(slot); // Row Down The Smith Screen
    outStream.writeWord(id + 1); // item
    outStream.writeByte(amount); // how many there are?
    outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();

}

public void initSmithing(int barType) {
int bar=0;
if (barType==2349)
bar=0;
if (barType==2351)
bar=1;
if (barType==2353)
bar=2;
if (barType==2359)
bar=3;
if (barType==2361)
bar=4;
if (barType==2363)
bar=5;
String types[]={“Dagger”,“Axe”,“Chain Body”,“Med Helm”,“Dart Tips”,“Sword”,“Mace”,“Plate Legs”,“Full Helm”,“Arrow Tips”,“Scimitar”,“Warhammer”,“Plateskirt”,“Sq Shield”,“Knives”,“Long Sword”,“Battle Axe”,“Platebody”,“Kite Shield”,“Wire”,“2h Sword”,“Claws”,“Lantern”,“Nails”,“Studs”};
//String types[]={"","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","","",""};

    outStream.createFrame(97);
flushOutStream();
    outStream.writeWord(994);
for(int j=0;j<25;j++)
{
	if(Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][0]!=0)
	{
		if(amountOfItem(barType)<Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][3])
			sendQuest("@red@"+Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][3]+"bars",Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][4]);
		else
			sendQuest("@gre@"+Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][3]+"bars",Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][4]);

		if(playerLevel[13]<Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][2])
			sendQuest("@red@"+types[j],Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][5]);
		else
			sendQuest("@gre@"+types[j],Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][5]);

  	} else {
		sendQuest("",Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][4]);
		sendQuest("",Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][5]);
	}
}	
	int counter=0;
	for (int k=0;k<5;k++) {
		for (int l=0;l<5;l++){
			if(Item.smithing_frame[bar][k*5+l][0]!=0){
				addItemToSmith(Item.smithing_frame[bar][counter][0],k,1119+l,Item.smithing_frame[bar][counter][1]);
			}	counter++;
		}
			
	}

}
/* END OF SMITHING*/
[/code]

I will do my best to explain why this works but i am bad at tutorial o.o (if you couldnt tell :))

Ok.
starting with initsmithing() because thats the first one i changed.

int bar=0; if (barType==2349) bar=0; if (barType==2351) bar=1; if (barType==2353) bar=2; if (barType==2359) bar=3; if (barType==2361) bar=4; if (barType==2363) bar=5;
this makes the numbers coincide with the ones in the array.
0=bronze,1=iron…and so on

String types[]={"Dagger","Axe","Chain Body","Med Helm","Dart Tips","Sword","Mace","Plate Legs","Full Helm","Arrow Tips","Scimitar","Warhammer","Plateskirt","Sq Shield","Knives","Long Sword","Battle Axe","Platebody","Kite Shield","Wire","2h Sword","Claws","Lantern","Nails","Studs"};

this actually is my labeling system.
it is the text that appears under the item in the smithing interface

outStream.createFrame(97); outStream.writeWord(994);

honestly i dont know what these do but i guessed they were important so i kept em :3

now i am going to label the numbers that are in the array

Item.smithing_frame[BAR][ITEMTYPE][INFO FOR ITEM]

INFO ON ITEM:
{0-Item Id that will be smithed, 1-number created/smith,2-level required to smith,3-number of bars required,4-this is where the sendquest puts the text for numberofbars,5-same as before but for the item name instead}
the numbers are the ones you use in the info spot

[code] for(int j=0;j<25;j++)
{
if(Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][0]!=0)//this makes sure it dosnt allow you to make “nothing” items
{
if(amountOfItem(barType)<Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][3])//if you have enough bars to make the item
sendQuest("@red@"+Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][3]+“bars”,Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][4]);//appears green
else//if you dont have enough bars to make this item
sendQuest("@gre@"+Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][3]+“bars”,Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][4]);//appear red

		if(playerLevel[13]<Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][2])//if your level if high enough to make it
			sendQuest("@red@"+types[j],Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][5]);//show green
		else//level isnt high enough
			sendQuest("@gre@"+types[j],Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][5]);//show red

  	} else {//makes the lines empty instead
		sendQuest("",Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][4]);
		sendQuest("",Item.smithing_frame[bar][j][5]);
	}
}	[/code]

public boolean canSmith(int item) { for (int i=0;i<6;i++)//bar types { for (int j=0;j<25;j++)//item type { if(Item.smithing_frame[i][j][0]==item)//the first value is the name of the item and this checks if the item is the same as the one that is trying to be smithed if (Item.smithing_frame[i][j][2]<=playerLevel[13])//if level is high enough return true; } } if (item == 15335 && playerLevel[13] >= 99)//these are exceptions made for godswords return true; if (item == 15334 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) return true; if (item == 15333 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) return true; if (item == 15336 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) return true; if (item == 15195 && playerLevel[13] >= 99) return true; return false; }
